page.title: 02EDUCATION - C.of E. SCHOOL_
page.content: The main part of our school was opened in July, 1967. There were only 6 teachers then and 162 children. In September 1967 the school opened to Ellerker and Everthorpe children. Our school now has 4 buildings and 280 children. Our ages vary between 5 and 11 years. We have 3 extra buildings, The Resource Area was added in October 1969, The Sports Centre and 4 classrooms in March, l975. The prefabricated building was opened in September 1984. South Cave School employs one headmaster, one deputy headteacher, seven lady teachers, three gentlemen teachers, one teachers' aide, one secretary, one caretaker, six cleaners, one part time gardener. We have two peripatetic music teachers.
